issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

from http://helpdesk.appcelerator.net/tickets/2316:

two requests:

1) when allowImageEditing is true and you have an overlay - you cannot edit the image
2) is there a way to set the height and width of the edit region when editing a photo

{html}

comments.body:
{html}

(from [8796b42191abe1e8b53d6820d4d4dacbbe754fb5]) - [#912 state:resolved] allow editing and overlay of camera to place nicely together - fixed problem in memory releasing that cause the view to be re-attached - fixed crash after taking picture on iphone4 which was caused by mutation during rotation http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/8796b42191abe...

{html}
